attributes.action: Release suitable prisoners for early release due to lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Since lockdown prisoners have been suffering immensely as they haven't been able to see family, have excercise or any form of rehabilitation.
attributes.background: To release prisoners with low risk and place them on home curfew

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567457
